long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension helps you easily save and restore your pinned tabs for later use. Whether you're working on multiple projects or just need to pause your browsing session, this tool allows you to store your pinned tabs and quickly reopen them whenever needed.

With a simple and intuitive interface, you can save your pinned tabs in one click and access them again at any time, ensuring you never lose track of important websites. Perfect for users who want to stay organized and efficient while navigating the web.
